# Getting ready

First we load libraries.
```{r libraries, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(phyloseq)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(Biostrings)
```



```{r files_and_directories, include=FALSE}
atacama.ps.rds = "/data/tutorial_data/atacama_1pct.rds"
```

```{r}
atacama.ps = read_rds(atacama.ps.rds)
print(atacama.ps)
```

```{r}
tax_table(atacama.ps) %>%
  as.data.frame %>%
  rownames %>%
  DNAStringSet ->
  my_stringset

seq(length(my_stringset)) %>%
  paste("asv",., sep="_") ->
  asv_names

names(my_stringset) <- asv_names
my_stringset

writeXStringSet(my_stringset, "/home/guest/scratch/test.fasta")
```
